name: @js-from-routes/core
description: Utilities for formatting URLs and transforming responses.

scripts.postpublish: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag core@$PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags
